entities.name: boggart
entities.description: A creature that takes the form of what each person fears. It is mentioned that nobody knows what a boggart looks like when it's alone.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: The teacher who is guiding Harry and his friends in dealing with the boggart. He mentions that having company helps to confuse the boggart.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the students being guided by Professor Lupin. He tries to answer a question about the boggart.

relationships.description: The boggart becomes confused when it has multiple people to take the form of, as mentioned by Professor Lupin.
The boggart frightens Harry, but only because it takes the form of what he fears.
